title: Mobile Microlearning Design to Strengthen Medical Imaging Interpretation Competency

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental knowledge of medical imaging interpretation and clinical experience
context.additional_context: Customized curriculum design for in-service professionals, conducted in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.

learning_goals: Learners can apply video interpretation strategies that combine non-analytical reasoning (intuitive judgment) and analytical reasoning (systematic analysis) to real-world cases.
Learners can improve their accuracy in recognizing key video patterns by 20% through daily 30-minute learning using 5-minute microlearning content provided via a mobile platform.
Learners can correct and supplement over 80% of error cases presented in formative assessments through peer feedback and instructor coaching.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
